name: Infinitesimal Point
description: Main character has been attacked by a strange creature, and gets into the off-world through the portal. Here he faces a long journey where every new step is a danger. Crowds of foes will turn his way into hardship.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 GPU with 1GB of memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: x86 Quad Core 3.4GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 GPU with 2GB of memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
